peril.model

Class ModelPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • peril.model.ModelPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player

    public final class ModelPlayer
extends java.util.Observable
implements Player
    The internal representation of a player of the game. This object will hold all of the tracked statistics about a player.
    Since:
    2018-03-09
    Version:
    1.01.04
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, Ezekiel_Trinidad, Joseph_Rolli
    See Also:
    Player, Observable

      AI ai
      The AI that will control this ModelPlayer.
      private int continents
      The number of ModelContinents the ModelPlayer owns.

      The number of the ModelCountrys the ModelPlayer owns.
      private int countriesTaken
      The number of ModelCountrys the ModelPlayer has conquered.
      ModelArmy distributableArmy
      The ModelArmy to be distributed by the ModelPlayer at the start of the next turn.
      int number
      Numerical Representation of the ModelPlayer.
      private int points
      The amount of points the ModelPlayer has to spend.
      private int pointsSpent
      The number of points the ModelPlayer has spent.
      ModelArmy totalArmy
      The total ModelArmy of the ModelPlayer.
      private int unitsKilled
      The number of units the ModelPlayer has killed.

        public void spendPoints(int points)
